pricing.coversText: Brief & matching, PM (light), acceptance, secure records, payments ops
pricing.guarantee: If we deliver fewer than 2 proposals within 3 days after your brief is finalized, you get a $500 credit toward your first project.
pricing.packagesNote: Need more than one area? Packages launch Nov 1, 2025. Pricing will be announced at launch.

free.a: Yes. You only pay if you start a project.

feeShown.q: How is the Nimara fee shown?
feeShown.a: As Professional services — Nimara platform & PM oversight on your proposal/budget.

feeAmount.q: What's the fee for single-category work?
feeAmount.a: Typically 22–28% (minimum $1,250, cap $9,000). It covers brief, PM, acceptance, secure records (kept 7 years), and payments ops.

multiArea.q: What if my need spans multiple areas?
multiArea.a: We can start today as simple single-category work, or you can join the Packages waitlist (launching Nov 1, 2025). Package pricing will be shared at launch.

consultantRate.q: Does this reduce the consultant's rate?
consultantRate.a: No. The Nimara line is in addition to the consultant's delivery line.

payments.a: Default milestones 60% kickoff / 30% UAT / 10% close. Consultants are paid net-15 on acceptance.
